title: Effective Writing (Write Right 7-8)
description: Practice grammar, structure and writing for your level.   Weekly Topics:  Week 1:  How to Outline  -The effect of Rhetorical questions in writing.  Week 2:  Contrast & Compare    -Get your message across in Writing.   Week 3:   Argument Essay   -Illustrate an organized paragraph.   Week 4:   Resume writing   -Managing your time(IELTS Test Strategies/Writing Skills).   -Writing a Report.   Week 5:   Support your details in writing   -Construct your main Idea effectively.   Week 6:   Various Essay Writing   -Professional Email Writing.   -Critics in Essay Writing.

organizer.name: George Brown College School of ESL

venue.name: George Brown College School of ESL

title: Just Write
description: This is a creative writing session for beginners, experienced writers and the curious. Creative writing is a wonderful brainy activity and a great way to tap into our creative expression. In this workshop you will have the opportunity to write a few short pieces and then have the chance to share your work with others. This is a fun and supportive session that encourages the creative writer in all of us!
